card.description: Survey of customers in a diner on whether or not they like certain poutine combinations

context.potentialUses: Help make recommendations for what kind of poutine a new customer should order

fields.description: Does the poutine include mushrooms toppings?
Does the poutine include lobster toppings?
Does the poutine include pork toppings?
Does the poutine include bacon toppings?
Does the poutine include cheese toppings?
Does the poutine include gravy toppings?
Does the poutine include scallions toppings?
Does the poutine include meat toppings?
Does the poutine include bell peppers toppings?
Do you like or dislike the poutine?
